message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $13500?
I'm still very interested in the product, but I was thinking $12000 would be a more comfortable price for me. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I'm still not willing to sell at $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $13250?
I'm getting close to considering buying from another seller, but I still think this product would be a great fit for me. Can you really not meet me at $12000?
